title: Embedded C: Building IoT Projects with Raspberry Pi and ESP32
description: Embedded C programming remains the backbone of the embedded systems world, powering everything from simple microcontrollers to complex IoT devices. This article explores how to leverage C's strengths in embedded development using a Raspberry Pi as your development platform and an ESP32 microcontroller as your deployment target.

title: Embedded Rust: Building IoT Projects with Raspberry Pi and ESP32
description: The embedded systems landscape has been traditionally dominated by C and C++, but Rust has emerged as a compelling alternative that promises memory safety without sacrificing performance. This article explores how to leverage Rust's strengths in embedded development using a Raspberry Pi as your development platform and an ESP32 microcontroller as your deployment target.
